item.title: Update a rebranded product
item.description: https://shortcut.com/ - Project management platform. Free for up to 10 users forever.

item.title: Add MagicPattern
item.description: https://www.magicpattern.design/tools - A collection of CSS & SVG background generators & tools for gradients, patterns, and blobs.

item.title: Add blob generator and CSS gradient maker
item.description:
https://www.magicpattern.design/tools/blob-generator - — Create random organic-shaped blobs with solid colors, linear/radial gradients, and pattern fills.
https://www.magicpattern.design/tools/gradient-generator - Generator](https://www.magicpattern.design/tools/gradient-generator) — Create, save & share beautiful CSS linear, radial, and conic gradients for your backgrounds.

item.title: add netdata
item.description: https://www.netdata.cloud/ - Netdata is an open source tool designed to collect real-time metrics.Great fast growing product. It can also be found in github!

item.title: added meercode.io
item.description: https://www.netdata.cloud/ - Real-time performance monitoring, done right! Netdata is high-fidelity infrastructure monitoring and troubleshooting.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://hyperforms.app/ - Create form to email and more in seconds and without backend code. The Personal account gives you up to 50 form submissions per month for free.

item.title: Add ZenRows
item.description: https://www.zenrows.com/ - Web Scraping API & proxy server that bypasses any anti-bot solution while offering javascript rendering, rotating proxies, and geotargeting. Free tier of 1000 API calls.

item.title: Added Export SDK, a PDF generator API with generous free plan.
item.description: https://exportsdk.com - - PDF generator API with drag and drop template editor that also provides an SDK and no-code integrations. Free plan comes with 250 pages per month, unlimited users and three templates.

item.title: Add Flowdash
item.description: https://flowdash.com/ - Automate business workflows. Free tier for up to 3 users, 1000 tasks, and 3 workflows.
